content: **crocheted shawl in drops air the piece is worked sideways with treble crochets ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-448 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down middle = approx 13-14 cm width measured along top = approx 80 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 12 moss green **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
